com.guoxiaoxing.gxadapter

类 FCAdapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • com.guoxiaoxing.gxadapter.GXAdapter<T>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    FastScroller.onCreateBubbleTextListener
    直接已知子类:
    FCItemDraggableAdapter, FCMultiItemAdapter, FCSectionAdapter

    public abstract class FCAdapter<T>
extends <any>
implements FastScroller.onCreateBubbleTextListener
    This class is backed by an ArrayList of arbitrary objects of T, where T is your Model object containing the data. This class provides a set of standard methods to handle changes on the data set such as filtering, adding, removing, moving and animating an item. This Adapter supports a set of standard methods for Headers/Sections expand and collapse an Expandable item, to Drag&Drop and Swipe any item.

    For more information, you can contact me by guoxiaoxing@souche.com

    从以下版本开始:
    16/9/18 上午10:43

    • 构造器详细资料

      • FCAdapter

        public FCAdapter(int layoutResId,
                 java.util.List<T> data)
        Same as QuickAdapter#QuickAdapter(Context,int) but with some initialization data.
        参数:
        layoutResId - The layout resource id of each item.
        data - A new list is created out of this one to avoid mutable list

      • getItemCount

        public int getItemCount()
        Get the number of item that will be created
        返回:
        item count

      • getItemViewType

        public int getItemViewType(int position)
        Get the type of View that will be created by getItemView(int, ViewGroup) for the specified item.
        参数:
        position - The position of the item within the adapter's data set whose view type we want.
        返回:
        An integer representing the type of View. Two views should share the same type if one can be converted to the other in getItemView(int, ViewGroup). Note: Integers must be in the range 0 to getItemCount() - 1.

      • getDefItemViewType

        protected int getDefItemViewType(int position)

      • getItemView

        protected android.view.View getItemView(int layoutResId,
                                        android.view.ViewGroup parent)
        参数:
        layoutResId - ID for an XML layout resource to load
        parent - Optional view to be the parent of the generated hierarchy or else simply an object that provides a set of LayoutParams values for root of the returned hierarchy
        返回:
        view will be return

      • bindData

        protected abstract void bindData(FCViewHolder holder,
                                 T item)
        Implement this method and use the holder to adapt the view to the given item.
        参数:
        holder - A fully initialized holder.
        item - The item that needs to be displayed.

        返回:
        The id of the item at the specified position.

      • onViewAttachedToWindow

        public void onViewAttachedToWindow(RecyclerView.ViewHolder holder)
        Called when a view created by this adapter has been attached to a window. simple to solve item will layout using all setFullSpan(RecyclerView.ViewHolder)
        参数:
        holder -

      • setFullSpan

        protected void setFullSpan(RecyclerView.ViewHolder holder)
        When set to true, the item will layout using all span area. That means, if orientation is vertical, the view will have full width; if orientation is horizontal, the view will have full height. if the hold view use StaggeredGridLayoutManager they should using all span area
        参数:
        holder - True if this item should traverse all spans.

      • onAttachedToRecyclerView

        public void onAttachedToRecyclerView(RecyclerView recyclerView)

      • onDetachedFromRecyclerView

        public void setSpanSizeLookup(FCAdapter.SpanSizeLookup spanSizeLookup)
        参数:
        spanSizeLookup - instance to be used to query number of spans occupied by each item

        public void addHeaderView(android.view.View header)
        Append header to the rear of the mHeaderLayout.
        参数:

      • addHeaderView

        public void addHeaderView(android.view.View header,
                          int index)
        Add header view to mHeaderLayout and set header view position in mHeaderLayout. When index = -1 or index >= child count in mHeaderLayout, the effect of this method is the same as that of addHeaderView(View).
        参数:
        header -
        index - the position in mHeaderLayout of this header. When index = -1 or index >= child count in mHeaderLayout, the effect of this method is the same as that of addHeaderView(View).

      • addFooterView

        public void addFooterView(android.view.View footer)
        Append footer to the rear of the mFooterLayout.
        参数:
        footer - footer

      • addFooterView

        public void addFooterView(android.view.View footer,
                          int index)
        Add footer view to mFooterLayout and set footer view position in mFooterLayout. When index = -1 or index >= child count in mFooterLayout, the effect of this method is the same as that of addFooterView(View).
        参数:
        footer - footer
        index - the position in mFooterLayout of this footer. When index = -1 or index >= child count in mFooterLayout, the effect of this method is the same as that of addFooterView(View).

      • removeHeaderView

        public void removeHeaderView(android.view.View header)
        remove header view from mHeaderLayout. When the child count of mHeaderLayout is 0, mHeaderLayout will be set to null.
        参数:
        header - header

      • removeFooterView

        public void removeFooterView(android.view.View footer)
        remove footer view from mFooterLayout, When the child count of mFooterLayout is 0, mFooterLayout will be set to null.
        参数:
        footer - footer

      • setEmptyView

        public void setEmptyView(boolean isHeadAndEmpty,

        isFootAndEmpty - isFootAndEmpty
        emptyView - emptyView

      • getEmptyView

        public android.view.View getEmptyView()
        When the current adapter is empty, the BaseQuickAdapter can display a special view called the empty view. The empty view is used to provide feedback to the user that no data is available in this AdapterView.
        返回:
        The view to show if the adapter is empty.

      • expand

        public int expand(int position,
                  boolean animate,
                  boolean shouldNotify)
        Expand an expandable item
        参数:
        position - position of the item
        animate - expand items with animation
        shouldNotify - notify the RecyclerView to rebind items, false if you want to do it yourself.
        返回:
        the number of items that have been added.

      • expand

        public int expand(int position,
                  boolean animate)
        Expand an expandable item
        参数:
        position - position of the item, which includes the header layout count.
        animate - expand items with animation
        返回:
        the number of items that have been added.

        返回:

      • expandAll

        public int expandAll(int position,
                     boolean animate,
                     boolean notify)

      • expandAll

        public int expandAll(int position,
                     boolean init)
        expand the item and all its subItems
        参数:
        position - position of the item, which includes the header layout count.
        init - whether you are initializing the recyclerView or not. if true, it won't notify recyclerView to redraw UI.
        返回:
        the number of items that have been added to the adapter.

      • collapse

        public int collapse(int position,
                    boolean animate,
                    boolean notify)
        Collapse an expandable item that has been expanded..
        参数:
        position - the position of the item, which includes the header layout count.
        animate - collapse with animation or not.
        notify - notify the recyclerView refresh UI or not.
        返回:
        the number of subItems collapsed.

      • collapse

        public int collapse(int position)
        Collapse an expandable item that has been expanded..
        参数:
        position - the position of the item, which includes the header layout count.
        返回:
        the number of subItems collapsed.

        返回:
